title: Whose Wages Are Falling Behind the Least amid Surging Inflation?
description: For a majority of workers, wages didnâ€™t increase as fast as inflation in the 12 months ended in second quarter 2022. Here, we dig deeper to see how outcomes may have differed across groups of workers.
